itunes:title: Episode 695 - DB Sports Companion Show 10/13/20 - Drew Brees And Tom Brady Get Old
title: Episode 695 - DB Sports Companion Show 10/13/20 - Drew Brees And Tom Brady Get Old
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss Lebron winning the NBA Championship for the Lakers and getting his "respect", how Drew Brees and Tom Brady are no longer competing for the Super Bowl anymore, the Atlanta Braves possibly redeeming the city after th...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss Lebron winning the NBA Championship for the Lakers and getting his "respect", how Drew Brees and Tom Brady are no longer competing for the Super Bowl anymore, the Atlanta Braves possibly redeeming the city after the Atlanta Falcons finally fired Dan Quinn, tonight's Tuesday night NFL game, and as always we give you the picks for this week's College Football and NFL games.  And "Fake Dan" has a wild golf bet.

ghostbed.com/drinkinbros
